titleStmt.title: A true relation, of the horrid and barbarous murther, committed on the bodys of Mr. Loggins, gent. and the ostler of the King's-Head in Coleshill in the county of VVarvvick, by four persons; whereof three were apprehended, and committed to the county-goal.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by E. Mallet, next door to Mr. Shipton's coffee-house, near Fleet-bridge,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: This may be printed, R.P. March the 16th. 1686.
With an advertisement at the foot of p. 4.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: E. Mallet, next door to Mr. Shipton's coffee-house
